00033 /*!
00034     Analogue line T.30 FAX channel descriptor. This defines the state of a single working
00035     instance of an analogue line soft-FAX machine.
00036 */
00037 struct fax_state_s
00038 {
00039     /*! \brief The T.30 back-end */
00040     t30_state_t t30;
00041     
00042     /*! \brief The analogue modem front-end */
00043     fax_modems_state_t modems;
00044 
00045     /*! \brief Error and flow logging control */
00046     logging_state_t logging;
00047 };
00048 
00049 #endif
